DOC.brief_summary: To provide systemic , uniform user-friendly tool collection data prostate cancer salvage cryotherapy multicenter set . The goal learn short long term efficacy safety procedure . Ultimately data analysis serve robust guidance instrument improve upon utilization procedure treatment patient recurrent ( LRD ) prostate cancer .
DOC.criteria: Read & understand inform consent relate study include consent HIPPA authorization Undergone salvage cryotherapy prostate recurrent prostate cancer Patients underwent radical prostatectomy primary therapy significant surgery ( except prostatic biopsy ) Patients clinically confirm distant metastasis ( unless deem beneficial treat physician ) Any previous major rectal surgery Clinically significant low urinary tract rectal anomaly Existing urethral , rectal , bladder fistula
